title: Dream of wrapping cabbage and boiling it in a dream

preview.html: It is considered one of the most famous Egyptian dishes that are cooked in most seasons of the year, but it has a special taste in the winter. Interpretation of cabbage in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Whoever dreams that he has seeds in his hand, cabbage in a dream indicates that he has begun planning to achieve his goals. It may indicate the beginning is difficult to correct. As for For those who see themselves planting cabbage seeds at home, this is a sign of recovery from illness. The meaning of boiling cabbage in a dream: Dreaming about boiling cabbage and drinking it from boiling water indicates that the dreamer has medicines for his illness. It also indicates the fulfillment of dreams after fatigue and effort. Sterile face When you dream of drinking boiling water, this is a sign Meaning of wrapping cabbage in a dream: Cabbage in a woman’s dream indicates a cruel man. Anyone who sees that it is rotten cabbage shows an attempt to contain her husband or her fat father. Cabbage in a dream indicates saved money. It also indicates repentance after committing sins. Meanings of a dream Cabbage in a dream indicates money and good nutrition. When a person dreams that he is eating white cabbage in a dream, this indicates his success and success in obtaining money after his hard work. As for whoever sees the bright green color of cabbage, it indicates the dreamer’s emergence from his crises and the end of worry and sadness. Whoever dreams of planting Cabbage in a dream indicates his satisfaction. Seeing cabbage in a man’s dream. A man’s dream of cabbage indicates a broad diet and grace. Green cabbage symbolizes the wealth of the man. Whoever dreams of catching white cabbage indicates that he has chosen a beautiful and suitable girl for his engagement. When a young man dreams that he is eating green cabbage, this It means that he is eating green cabbage and his marriage very soon. Whoever boils cabbage in a dream portends obtaining a new job with a higher salary than the previous one as a result of an effort at work. Whoever dreams of planting cabbage seeds in a large and spacious garden announces Friday to attend a wedding. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to the marital status in Comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing flies in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing flies in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. In a dream, their vision is worse, as they may appear in unnatural and frightening shapes and sizes for some, causing them anxiety. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing flies in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fly in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if a person dreams of the presence of a group of flies around him, then his dream indicates that he will perform forbidden actions, but if He fought it, as this is evidence of his salvation from his worries, sorrows, and emotions. . . From security. Seeing flies standing on his hand indicates that the dreamer is holding what is not his right, and if the flies are standing on the eye, it symbolizes that the dreamer is observing the forbidden, and the fly standing on the head means this. The man is in trouble and the woman is in it. Collecting flies in a dream is a sign of collecting money through forbidden means, and if one sees that flies are gathering in abundance in his house, then seeing them is committing many sins and disobedience, and expelling them from the house is good. Newsletter. A dreamer realizes his ambitions and dreams. If he is sick, this is an indication that he will recover soon. Interpretation of the dream of seeing flies in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen From the point of view of the scholar Ibn Shaheen, seeing dead flies in a dream for a sick person means that he will recover soon, and if he is suffering from a lack of livelihood, then seeing him soon indicates an increase in He gave him sustenance and killed the flies. The dream is evidence of the observer’s consideration of God in his actions, as well as the enjoyment of good health. Whoever sees that there is a fly in his house constantly flying, this means that the dreamer is suffering from the hatred and malice of those close to him, and the presence of a fly in his bed is a sign. His salvation from his worries and sorrows and the presence of many righteous people on the way to him. If a person dreams of a large group of flies scattered in his house, his dream indicates that he will be saved from the conspiracy planned for him. As for seeing flies standing on money, it is evidence of the loss or theft of money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing flies in a dream: Flies in an unmarried woman’s dream mean a bad woman and she is famous for gossiping. If an unmarried woman sees flies standing on her head, this means that there is an enemy who hates her, and seeing Flies are a lot of evidence. she has. Envy of people and that their money is not permissible. And whoever sees in her dream that she killed some flies, this is a sign for her that she will gain peace and comfort, and the spread of flies around her without moving away from her means that there is something annoying in her, and if the flies stop eating her, then the vision warns her of her money being forbidden. Interpretation A dream about seeing flies in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a fly approaching her, this is a sign of the presence of an evil man who is jealous of her and is approaching her. And for a married woman who sees that flies have entered her mouth, this vision prevents her from entering her home with forbidden food, and if she eats it, this means her acceptance. For this money.Interpretation of a dream about seeing flies in a dream for a pregnant woman. A dream about a pregnant woman seeing flies indicates that she will not talk about a hateful act and will keep it a secret. Flies that arrive

title: Interpretation of smoking tobacco in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Interpretation of smoking in a dream for different occasions. In real life, the smoking habit is one of the bad habits that attracts addiction to its owner and over time is the cause of his death. The meaning of this vision, and it means negative, as I do, the meaning of smoking in reality is negative or its interpretation in a dream is different and indicates positive things that may happen in reality, so in this article today we will learn in order to interpret smoking in a dream for different occasions. Interpretation of seeing smoke in a dream suggested by commentators Different interpretations of seeing someone smoking in a dream, according to the situation in which the dreamer saw himself in the dream: If one sees in a dream that someone is smoking, this is a sign of a realistic relationship with this person. But it will cause a series of problems and disagreements between them. While when you see someone you know smoking cigarette ashes in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer will gradually get rid of his worries and problems, God willing. Also, whoever sees in his dream a famous person smoking and exhaling a large amount of smoke like a cloud from his mouth. This is a sign that the dreamer cares about this person and that he cares for him and takes care of him. A plot of land. While if this person blows smoke in front of the visionary, this is an indication that he is an annoying person and brings misfortune and misfortune to the visionary. Interpretation of seeing a pack of cigarettes When one dreams of a pack of cigarettes, whether it is open or closed, this means that the dreamer will have a friend who has Money and status. While an empty ashtray in a dream indicates the presence of a close friend of the dreamer who loves him deeply and cares for him. Also, lighting cigarettes in a dream indicates that the insightful person has begun to achieve profits and success in his new work, but if the insightful person lights a cigarette for someone Else, it means that he will get a lot of good as a result of his knowledge for her. Face. While a broken cigarette in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a major health problem that God Almighty will deal with so that he does not suffer from a greater disaster. Interpretation of seeing a girl smokingWhen an unmarried woman dreams that she is smoking, this is a sign that she is accompanied by many friends with bad intentions Bad people and morals who want to harm her, just as one woman sees smoking with the feeling that the joy and happiness of the bad. Companions who want to take all of her belongings. But if an unmarried woman sees herself smoking with a feeling of sadness and grief, this indicates that there is abundant good for her, represented by her repentance from sins and transgressions and returning to the path of repentance and faith. Also, seeing an unmarried woman quitting smoking also indicates That she will give up bad habits. When an unmarried woman dreams that someone is forcing her to smoke, this is an indication that she is following a behavior that she believes is right, but in reality it is a serious mistake that she must abandon until she does it. . It does not cause her many problems. If a single woman sees in her dream that she is smoking while looking at the ground, this is a sign that there is someone she knew in the past who wants to get close to her again. Whereas if she smokes

title: Interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Wrestling is a competitive martial art and there are many different types. Wrestling is considered one of the oldest sports, and today through this article we will present to you the interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream according to great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir and others. Dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the fortuneteller, whether he is male, single, or married. Interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream suggests that the dreamer is exposed to many problems and disagreements between him and his family, which may lead to the severing of ties of kinship. Vision A fight between two people in a dream indicates many evil people in the dreamer’s life who always wish him harm. A wrestling victory in a dream indicates the dreamer’s liberation from all enemies in his life and his victory over them. Fighting with animals in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve all his dreams and desires in life. Defeat in wrestling in a dream indicates that the viewer is exposed to many crises and reflections in his life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Jan being strangled in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing fighting with a sharp object in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer will be blessed with a lot of kindness and blessings. We wish you success in his life. Fighting with the king in a dream indicates that the dreamer has faced many failures in his personal and professional life. Seeing a sick person fighting in a dream indicates a bad health condition that may lead him to his life soon, and God knows best. Fighting a lion in a dream indicates improvement. The fortuneteller’s conditions and circumstances are for the better because of someone close to him. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a lion attacking in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream for a single woman. Seeing women fighting alone in a dream shows that she will soon marry a good and suitable person for her. Quarrel with the ruler in a dream for a single woman announces her marriage to someone for him. A high position in society. Seeing an unmarried woman fighting a bull in a dream shows that she has faced many obstacles and difficulties in her life. Interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman quarreling with her husband in a dream indicates that he is living a married life full of happiness, stability and contentment. Quarrel with children in A dream for a married woman indicates the extent to which she seeks to raise her children well. Seeing a married woman quarreling with her relatives in a dream indicates that there is a major problem between her and this person that will lead to quarrels and estrangement. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing someone complaining to you in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a woman A pregnant woman fighting in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Freestyle wrestling in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will undergo an easy and affordable birth, and she and her child will enjoy good health. Seeing a pregnant woman fighting a snake in a dream indicates that she will face health problems during pregnancy, but they will end quickly, by God. a

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing oranges in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an orange in a dream: Seeing oranges in a dream indicates a lot of nutrition and goodness, especially since the orange fruit is a halal food and has great benefits for the human body, especially since it is rich in nutritional values, and in general it is a good vision, and through this article we learn the interpretation of the dream of seeing oranges in a dream Seeing oranges in a person’s dream can bring them food and goodness that will come to them in the coming days. In this article, we learn about seeing oranges in someone’s dream: When a person sees in his dream that he is picking oranges, this is good news about the approaching wedding and marriage date. Imam Ibn Sirin: He explains seeing oranges in general for the dreamer’s safety and physical health. He pointed out that seeing oranges Evidence of the abundance of wealth and goodness that the one who sees the vision gains. Many orange beads show wealth, wealth, and halal living. If one dreams that he is sleeping on a pile of oranges, then this vision indicates the end of the term for a relative. Seeing oranges in a dream, either one bead or two beads This vision refers to children. As for sweet oranges, they are a good boy, and bitter oranges are a problem and illness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an orange in a dream for a married man. When a married man sees that he is picking oranges, it is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate goodness, blessing, and lawful living. We continue to interpret the vision of oranges. In a dream for a married man: Whoever sees in his dream an orange tree that has a beautiful image that comforts the soul and is full of ripe fruits, it is good and successful for the dreamer. It has been said in the interpretation of eating oranges for a married man that it is unpleasant and that one of his loved ones may get sick. For a married merchant, eating oranges in His dream indicates the loss that he will suffer, but in a small percentage that will not be greatly affected. Whoever buys an orange and feeds it to his wife indicates the death of life’s worries and problems. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing spitting in a dream by Ibn Sirin and what it indicates. The meaning of seeing orange trees in a dream and its interpretation. Seeing orange trees in a dream. A healthy condition and ripe fruits mean success and goodness. We continue to interpret the vision of orange trees in a dream and interpret it through the following points: Seeing yourself eating oranges in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that indicate the illness of a relative or someone dear to your heart and you can benefit from the loss of trade. And money. If the orange in the dream is beautiful and smells fragrant, then it is bad luck and a loss in trade and work, but in a small percentage. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a broken phone in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women. Interpretation of seeing orange trees in a dream. A dream is the means by which a person achieves his desires, especially If he has good visions and can feel psychological comfort as a result of these dreams, and to achieve this he must take the reasons with confidence in God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing cats in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin Oranges in a woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, and Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, indicates the response to prayers, the satisfaction of desires, and the death of worry and anxiety. Among the surahs of the Qur’an, seeing them in a dream indicates many different meanings, and dream interpreters indicate that some interpretations of Surah Al-Fatihah contain a lot of goodness that they convey to their viewers, and this can bring them with them. It is the presence of many different interpretations that carry many different warning meanings for the Lord, and a warning against falling into many bad events, and the interpretation varies from one person to another. Interpretation of a dream of reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a single woman. Its individual scenes cut to a person she may know who was speaking next to her, Then he recited Surah Al-Fatihah with absolute certainty. This is an indication that a good relationship, compassion and love are likely to arise between them. When an unmarried woman hears the sheikh reciting Surah Al-Fatihah in a sweet voice, this is evidence of the existence of goodness and abundance of livelihood. Hence, it is seen as a warning to her about knowing the duties of GodInterpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates her imminent marriage and that God Almighty will respond to her and her prayers. Change the vision of reading Surat Al-Fatihah for a single woman, that she will achieve what she wants, and this is a sign that she hears a lot of good news. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream means She hears a sheikh reciting Al-Fatihah or recites it at her wedding with a good and righteous sheikh. But if a single girl works in a job, this expresses her superiority and success. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a married woman. Reading Surat Al-Fatihah indicates A married woman with her children means that God will grant her children a high position in society. Seeing her eating the Qur’an and reciting Al-Fatiha from it is interpreted in a married woman’s dream. If the dreamer is afraid that something will happen in the dream, this indicates that security will come after fear. Hearing the recitation of Surat Al-Fatiha for a married woman She is exposed to many different problems with her husband, indicating that these disputes will end soon. The interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Fatiha in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will become pregnant very soon. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating fully cooked meat?

preview.html: The Hadot website gives you an interpretation of how you dream of eating boiled meat. Meat is one of the greatest things that man has eaten since the beginning of creation. Therefore, many people searched on research sites to find out what it means to eat cooked meat and what it means, as well as the interpretation of the dream of eating cooked meat. And rice, as well as the interpretation of the dream that we eat boiled meat, as well as how we collected for you, dear followers, the complete interpretation of eating boiled meat in a dream for singles, married people, pregnant women, and men. Why do you dream that you are eating boiled meat according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing whole boiled meat in a dream, which everyone loves to taste, is a wave Of kindness and happiness for his next life. He also explained to us that the dream of cooking beef and camel meat is a desirable dream, which indicates the fulfillment of desires. Seeing a sick person in a dream cooking a sheep and then eating it, means that God will rid him of the desire for a speedy recovery. In addition to that Seeing cooked meat and its bad taste means that you will face problems and tension that will torment the dreamer. There is boiled meat in a dream that is full and it was pork - evidence that the dreamer will fall into many immoralities and sins. In a dream there is only one boiled meat. Interpretation of the use of boiled meat for a woman Regular pork is an indication that she will emerge from her worries and sorrows and improve her situation forever. The interpretation of the dream of a girl eating boiled meat with her fiancé is one of the visions mentioned by scholars, which indicates the success of their relationship and the end of their marriage on good terms. The only woman who eats whole pork in a dream It is one of the dreams that shows that she has many wrong actions and evidence of her bad behavior. Seeing an unmarried woman eating raw meat in a complete dream indicates big problems that she will have to go through because of her bad actions. Also, dreaming of an ordinary woman eating raw meat is a sign On kindness and happiness and an indication of the approaching engagement and marriage of her. There is whole cooked meat in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of a married woman who sees whole cooked meat with rice in a dream means that her husband will get a lot of money and his life will improve. To see in a dream a whole feast of fried meat, and she ate From her, her husband, and her children, it is one of those visions that she witnesses in safety and brings them great happiness. Also, seeing a woman eating cooked meat and biting a woman’s teeth is evidence of many problems that will haunt her in her life. Preparing a feast in a complete dream for children in a complete dream is a sign of success. We wish you success in the lives of her children, and this is one of the desired visions. Why does a pregnant woman dream of boiled meat? Seeing cooked meat for a pregnant woman in a full dream is one of the good visions that have many meanings for the good health that she and her newborn will enjoy. Why do you dream of eating boiled meat in a dream? Full of pregnant women indicates a light and easy birth and an end to all the problems and troubles that she suffers from. Why do you dream of a boiled lamb? The interpretation of eating boiled meat, which is one of the

title: Interpretation of seeing a preacher as a good cleric in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a preacher as a good cleric in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. A man of the clergy or a preacher in a dream, this makes him very curious to know the meaning and interpretation of this dream, so in this article we will learn together today about the interpretation of seeing a preacher, who is a righteous cleric in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a preacher in a dream, explained by Imam Ibn Sirin stated in his book (Explanation of Great Dreams) that seeing sheikhs, preachers, and clerics is one of the praiseworthy visions in a dream, which portends the dreamer a prominent position in the world because he is righteous and maintains. We perform worship and stop what God Almighty has forbidden us. It is also a good vision that indicates that the dreamer seeks to learn knowledge directly, benefit from it, and benefit the people around him. Whoever sees in a dream a religious man in one of the places whose people suffer from calamities and troubles, then his vision is a good glimpse of The end of misfortunes and the disappearance of the worries of the people of that place. Seeing lots in a dream indicates that the dreamer will grant him a lot of goodness or that he will gain great status and prestige in the world and his conditions in this world will improve greatly, which he did not expect. According to interpretations, seeing a cleric In a dream, it expresses the dreamer’s wisdom and patience with the misfortunes and fears that befall him. He is a good man who is loved and appreciated by the people around him. Whereas anyone who sees in his dream that he has become a religious person who teaches science to people, but is not a scientist in reality, this indicates that there is Many problems that he will face in the coming period of his life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a righteous person in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees in a dream a religious man speaking to him and discussing with him, then seeing him warns him against that. Because he committed sin and transgression. It made him angry. Whoever sees a righteous religion giving him water to drink in a dream, then seeing it indicates his piety, and that he is a good believer who has a great status in this world and the hereafter. And if he gives him wine, this is something worthy of praise, which indicates that the dreamer will receive a lot in the afterlife as a reward for the good deeds that he He does it in this world. Just as seeing a religious man giving the dreamer milk, a good vision indicates the goodness of the dreamer’s heart, the purity of the soul, and the willingness to do good deeds to gain the satisfaction of Almighty God. And whoever dreams in a dream that he kisses a religious man, this indicates his good skin, which will keep him away. May God protect her from all evil and evil from those who intended to harm him, and it is also a praiseworthy vision that indicates goodness. The qualities of the dreamer and his good reputation among the people, so they respect him and place him in their midst. And when you see in a dream a famous religious man who was in reality old, but came to him in the form of a young man, then it is a good vision that promises him to obtain many goods, money, and health, God willing. Interpretation of a dream Seeing a religious man in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a religious man in an unmarried woman’s dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds the abundance of goodness, happiness, and success in this world, so she will find the happiness she has always sought. Some interpretations have also indicated that seeing a religious man

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dirham

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dirham in a dream in detail. It is one of the visions that herald good offspring for the dreamer. Money and seeing it in a dream indicates birth, childbirth, and children. You may also be interested in entering the house of the deceased in a dream. He suffers in his life. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Interpretation of seeing a dirham in a dream in detail Interpretation of seeing a dirham in a dream in detail And considering the interpretations of the great righteous, the interpretation of the dirham is as follows: Hearing the sound of the dirham gurgling when it falls to the ground, the vision indicates that the dreamer gets to know the eloquent and wise man. Seeing a pot of dirhams in a dream is evidence of an abundance of sustenance and many companions around the dreamer, and God knows best. Losing a dirham in a dream is a warning of evil, and the vision expresses illness or exposure to a harmful and dangerous danger that can lead to the death of the dreamer himself. Losing a dirham from the hand of an unmarried person is a sign of losing many successful jobs, and the vision indicates longing and negative haste, and God knows best. The permanent loss of a dirham in a dream indicates the death of the priest's son before his eyes, and the truth is that losing a dirham and then finding it again indicates that the priest's son was shot in the body. Read also: The penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing a dirham by Ibn Sirin According to what scholars interpreted in the interpretation of dreams and visions, Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the dirham on As follows: Seeing the fortune teller himself keeping several dirhams in his original share to save money from being lost is an indication that he is telling his secrets to his close friend and seeing the dirham drawn on it is an indication that the fortune teller is learning a new industry through which he earns a lot of money and God knows best. When a person sees himself owning a large dirham, this vision foretells him of traveling to the United Arab Emirates and working there and earning a lot of dirhams. Read also: Washing the dead Seeing the dirham in a dream for a man Talking about our topic Interpretation of seeing the dirham in a dream in detail Interpretation of the dirham for a man as follows: Watching the fortune teller hitting the dirham on the ground, this vision indicates the pregnant wife waiting for her young child, and the hammer on the dirham is a sign of the birth of a boy free from disease and God knows best. The dirham in a dream is the children, and losing or breaking it indicates harming the children. Seeing the dirham and it was erased without pictures or engravings on it, this vision expresses the corruption of the seer himself, and seeing it without a picture of the ruler of the state indicates the spread of corruption throughout the state, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dirham in a dream for a married woman According to the interpretation of dreams from Before the imams of Muslims through the websites, the interpretation of the dirham for a married woman is as follows: Seeing a married woman carrying a dirham in the palm of her hand indicates that she has a lot of money in a short time, and her loss of the dirham is a loss in her trade, and God knows best. Washing the dirham in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her interest in raising her children and taking care of them completely, and breaking the dirham in her dream is harm to one of the children. Throwing the dirham into the sea for a married woman is the drowning of her son in front of her, and

title: Interpretation of the dream of trimming nails for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced women according to Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about cutting nails for single, married, pregnant and divorced women in detail Ibn Sirin Some believe that nails are an organ outside the body and are marginal and grow automatically and periodically and one must be very careful about the principle of aesthetic only motive, but all medical research has denied this false belief, so he said that the nail It is a mirror through which the body is known and how healthy it is, and there is a large group of diseases that are diagnosed through the nail, and this does not happen. Do not deny taking care of your nails from the beginning. This is why I love many people. I would love to obtain all the information that revolves around the subject of the answer to the interpretation of the dream of cutting the nails of married single people, pregnant women, and divorced women, according to Ibn Sirin in detail because it is one of the dreams that many people dream of, and below is all the information about it. Okay, nonetheless. Interpretation A dream about cutting nails for a single woman: An unmarried girl is very concerned with her aesthetics, and she is very concerned with her body, and among the concerns that the girl attaches to her body are her nails. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is cutting her nails, then this dream indicates the great goodness that will accompany her throughout her life’s journey, God willing. God soon. And whoever sees in her dream that she is cutting her nails and her appearance is beautiful, the interpretation of this dream indicates the good morals that the dreamer enjoys. Dream interpretation scholars unanimously agreed that this dream of an unmarried girl is an indication of the good reputation that the dreamer enjoys among the people. To a large extent. Cutting the nails of an unmarried girl is an indication that the dreaming girl will be presented with a large number of suitors and will be confused about choosing her husband because all the marriage opportunities available to her are blessed by God Almighty. Belonging to one of the educational stages. She sees in her dream that she is cutting her nails. This dream indicates the great distinction that the girl will achieve in the educational stage of her dream. Anyone who belongs to a professional job and sees in a dream that she is cutting her nails, this dream indicates that the girl will obtain An opportunity for promotion, which will change the entire course of her life. See also: Interpretation of the dream of attending the wedding of singles by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail. Interpretation of the dream of trimming nails for a married woman. A married woman is very concerned with her beauty, and among the many aesthetics that are important to her are nails, she always wants the appearance of the nails to be very beautiful, Many people like to interpret the dream of cutting nails for a married woman. The interpretation of the dream is as follows: A woman who sees in a dream that she is cutting her nails, this dream indicates abundant goodness that will accompany her throughout her life. And for a married woman who sees in a dream that she is cutting her nails, the interpretation of this dream is interpreted as The good news that will accompany her throughout her life, God willing. If that is not a good omen for the news of her pregnancy, and she sees in a dream that she is cutting her nails, then this dream indicates that she will announce the news of her pregnancy. See also: Interpretation of the dream of attending an individual wedding by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail. Trimming nails in a dream for a pregnant woman who wants pain
